title: Fail to reproduce result of ResNet18 on ImageNet
body_html: Hi I tried the provided script in examples to train ImageNet but only got ~68% accuracy, which is far away from the expected result 69.76%. Can u give more suggestions? I add color augmentation in training step (transforms.ColorJitter(brightness=0.5, contrast=0.5, saturation=0.5, hue=0.5)) and other settings are identical to provided script.
